In Portland, over 4,000 people live in hopelessness and desperation on the streets.

And you can make a difference.

Every $12 you gift provides one full night of shelter, meals and restorative care â€“ the first step to a second chance for people in need.

Over 81% of people who graduate from a Portland Rescue Mission Restoration program are addiction-free and in housing three years after graduation.

Thank you for giving hope this holiday season and all year long.
